column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Angel - Thanks for the 5-star review! I'm also glad to know our extended-wait times during peak hours didn't dissuade your decision to try us out. That said
column2: we greatly appreciate your kind words
column3: and your even greater assessment of our ramen as "the best place you've been to around Texas" ! That means a great deal to us
column4: so on behalf of our entire staff
column5: thank you again and we hope to serve you again in the near future.
